com.revolsys.parallel.channel

Class Channel<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revolsys.parallel.channel.Channel<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChannelInput<T>, ChannelOutput<T>, SelectableChannelInput<T>, SelectableInput, Iterable<T>

    public class Channel<T>
extends Object
implements SelectableChannelInput<T>, ChannelOutput<T>

      • read

        public T read()
        Reads an Object from the Channel. This method also ensures only one of the readers can actually be reading at any time. All other readers are blocked until it completes the read.
        Specified by:
        read in interface ChannelInput<T>
        Returns:
        The object returned from the Channel.

      • read

        public T read(long timeout)
        Reads an Object from the Channel. This method also ensures only one of the readers can actually be reading at any time. All other readers are blocked until it completes the read. If no data is available to be read after the timeout the method will return null.
        Specified by:
        read in interface ChannelInput<T>
        Parameters:
        timeout - The maximum time to wait in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        The object returned from the Channel.

      • write

        public void write(T value)
        Writes an Object to the Channel. This method also ensures only one of the writers can actually be writing at any time. All other writers are blocked until it completes the write.
        Specified by:
        write in interface ChannelOutput<T>
        Parameters:
        value - The object to write to the Channel.
